Issue.creator: pschwarz
Issue.summary: Uncommitted Injected Batches Are Put in Pending Queue
Issue.description: When a block is uncommitted and has an injected batch, the injected batch will be put into the pending queue. This is due to the injected batch being not being included in any other batches published from other nodes in the network. The chain controller is unaware about the batches injected nature when it passes this info back to the block publisher.
